name: 方志鵬
objective:
介紹VLSI設計流程及技術地圖
基本演算法
分割
平面規劃
擺置、繞線(整體繞線、細部繞線)
時脈及電線/接地繞線
壓縮佈置後最佳化
時序建模及最佳化
訊號/電源完整性
其它和製作及可靠度有關之議題
schedule:
Introduction to VLSI design flow/automation, technology roadmap, and CMOS Technology (第一、二週)
Algorithmic graph theory and computational complexity (第三、四週)
Physical design
floorplanning (第五、六、七週)
compaction (第八、九、十週)
placement (第十一、十二週)
global routing (第十三、十四週)
detail routing (第十五、十六週)
Term project (第十七、十八週)
scorePolicy:
Mid-Term Exam  (30%)
Presence & Quiz (20%)
Homework/mini-programming assignments/Final Project  (40%)
materials:
1、Sadiq M. Sait & Habib Youssef, VLSI Physical Design Automation: Theory and Practice, Word Science,  2006.
2、S. H. Gerez, Algorithms for VLSI Design Automation, John Wiley & Sons, 1999.
3、Naveed Sherwani, Algorithms for VLSI Physical Design Automation, 3th Ed., Kluwer Academic Publishers (KAP), 2003
